title: Can't connect to Server (Attempting 1,2,3)

embed.description: Provides free image upload and hosting integration for forums. Free picture hosting and photo sharing for websites and blogs.

body: So I updated league of legends today and I haven't been able to actually log in because of a Constant error stating "Cannot connect to server (Attempting to Reconnect 1, 2, 3) this cycle keeps on repeating. I tried Reinstalling the game, Repatching the game, Restarting computer, Disbaling every single piece of firewall, Updating Internet Explorer, Updating Dns to 8.8.8.8 & 8.8.4.4 along with flushing the dns and all. I can't seem to find a single solution, Someone please help me :( [](https://postimg.org/image/ckql798iz/)

replies.body: I recommend bypassing your wireless router, disabling WiFi on your PC, then using a wired (Ethernet) connection directly to your modem. Let me know if this caused any change in your ability to log in.
